data.subject: Demon In Profile
data.lyric:
Criminal
 I'd bet you're bad
 See the knife in the water
 Send you back to bed
 
 All over your body

data.subject: Arabian Heights
data.lyric:
Run
 Seek thy fear
 All come down
 Disappear
 
 Don't be deceived
 Be not blind
 All fall down
 Unde

data.subject: Birdland
data.lyric:
I was a child
 An open letter
 To be read aloud to the throne
 Caught in the spell of stormy weather
